name: Ball Smasher: The Big Bang
description:
Did you missed a smashing game combined with physics? This is a colored ball avalanche and only physics and your agility can help. Are you ready?

[Description]

Eliminate colored ball groups before the board become full. Balls are continuously arriving, and the speed and the force they are thrown is continuously increasing.

Rotating the device you can adjust the already arranged balls, and you can influence the new balls arriving. This can be your friend, or … yep, it can ruin the actual good arrangement too.

For more points try to eliminate bigger groups and watch special balls.

[Features]

•Metal board/elements and colored hard jelly balls
•3 difficulties
•Special balls for addictive gameplay
•4 different levels
•Game Center integration, a Leaderboard where your score is counted

[Notes]
•New levels and different game modes (including multiplayer) soon!
